# dot-progress-bar



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                         | Type     | Default |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ------- |
| `progress` | `progress` | indicates the progress to be show, a value 1 to 100 | `string` | `'0'`   |
| `text`     | `text`     | text to be show bellow the progress bar             | `string` | `''`    |
